datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.intro: The protection of your personal data is of particular concern to us. We therefore process your data exclusively on the basis of the legal provisions (GDPR, TKG 2003).

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.text: When visiting our website, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your Internet service provider, and similar.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: Our website only uses technically necessary cookies. These cookies are required to enable the basic functions of our website.

contact.title: Contact Form
contact.text: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your information from the inquiry form including the contact data you provided there will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You generally have the rights to information, correction, deletion, restriction, data portability, revocation, and objection.
